def to_rgb(self, x):
        assert self.image_key == "segmentation"
        if not hasattr(self, "colorize"):
            self.register_buffer("colorize", torch.randn(3, x.shape[1], 1, 1).to(x))
        x = F.conv2d(x, weight=self.colorize)
        x = 2.*(x-x.min())/(x.max()-x.min()) - 1.
        return x
